name: Adduction & Extension
instruction: Squeeze knees together and push knees down at the same time, Hold 10 seconds; relax; repeat.

name: Ankle Pumps - Ap
instruction: Bend your foot up and down at your ankle joint as shown.

name: Cat And Camel
instruction: While on your hands and knees in a crawl position, raise up your back and arch it towards the ceiling.

name: Cow Pose Spinal Extension
instruction: In hands and knees with the hands under the shoulders and the knees under the hips, slowly inhale as you drop your belly towards the floor, bringing the shoulder blades together and opening your chest, lifting the chin gently towards the sky.   Roll the shoulders back and down and gently engage your abdominals to support the low back.  Exhaling, begin to bring the belly button in towards the spine and return to neutral or proceed towards Cat Pose.

name: Elastic Band - Straight Leg Raise - Slr
instruction: While lying on your back with an elastic band looped around your ankles, lift the target leg upwards.

name: Exercise Ball - Supine Knee Bends
instruction: While lying on your back, place your heels on an exercise ball and roll it closer to your buttocks as your knees and hips bend as shown. Then return to original position.

name: Heel Prop
instruction: Sit with leg propped (using a large towel, books, rollers, etc), relax letting the leg straighten into extension.

name: Knee Flexion
instruction: *Can also assist by placing your hand just above the knee and gently pressing down toward the floor.

name: Lower Trunk Rotations - Ltr
instruction: While seated with your knee in a bent position and your heel touching the ground, slowly straighten your knee as you raise your foot upwards as shown. Lower your foot back down until your heel touches the grounod and then repeat.

name: Partial Arc Quad - Low Seat
instruction: While lying or sitting with a small towel roll under your ankle, tighten your top thigh muscle to press the back of your knee downward towards the ground.

name: Quad Set With Towel Under Heel
instruction: Sit comfortably on the floor with your legs stretched out in front of you.  Place a rolled up towel under your affected knee.  Focus on straightening your knee, contracting your leg muscles, and pushing down into the towel roll.  Relax and repeat.
imgURL: QUAD SET WITH TOWEL UNDER HEEL.png

name: Quad Set
instruction: While lying on your side with your knees bent and an elastic band wrapped around your knees, draw up the top knee while keeping contact of your feet together as shown. Do not let your pelvis roll back during the lifting movement.

name: Seated Heel Slides
instruction: Start by lying on your side with the target ankle on the bottom. You should be lying so that your foot and ankle are off the edge of the bed or table. Next, move your ankle and foot upwards towards the ceiling as shown.

name: Sidelying Inversion
instruction: Rotate leg out externally. Squeeze back of knee against table/bed, focusing the motion through the inside aspect of your knee.

name: Static Quad - Vmo
instruction: In the standing position, hold a wand/cane with both arms, palm down on both sides. Raise the wand/cane up allowing your unaffected arm to perform most of the effort. Your affected arm should be partially relaxed.

name: Wand Flexion - Standing - Palms Down
instruction: Lying on your back with knees straight, slide the affected heel towards your buttock as you bend your knee. Use the unaffected leg to assist the bending.
